tags: this house is a nightmare vine
summary:
Peter: You know that I’m going to be taller than you someday, right?
Tony: Okay, you know what? You’re grounded. Get on top of...
body:
Peter: You know that I’m going to be taller than you someday, right?

Tony: Okay, you know what? You’re grounded. Get on top of the fridge. Get up there!

Peter: *climbing to the top of the fridge* This house is a fUCKING NIGHTMARE.

reblog.comment:
Peter: You know that I’m going to be taller than you someday, right?

Tony: Okay, you know what? You’re grounded. Get on top of the fridge. Get up there!

Peter: *climbing to the top of the fridge* This house is a fUCKING NIGHTMARE.

Peter: *climbing to the top of the fridge* This house is a fUCKING NIGHTMARE.

Hiddlestoner.
Fan blog dedicated to the awesome British actor Tom Hiddleston.

summary: The Greatest Villains Of All Time
title: The Greatest Villains Of All Time
excerpt: Read Empire's list of the best movie villains, as voted for by you.
description:
3. Loki

The Thor films (2011-2017), The Avengers (2012)

Even in the MCU, a place overflowing with memorable, witty heroes, there’s a chance for a villain to make more of an impact. So it was with Tom Hiddleston’s bitter, scheming adopted child of Asgard; Odinson by accident instead of birth. He was great in the original Thor, brightened up moments of The Dark World no end, but truly shined in the hands of Joss Whedon for Avengers Assemble. Both Hiddleston and Loki’s cinematic creators understood the power of the classic scheming “British” – he’s from another realm, don’t forget – villain and with Whedon he got to shine comedically as well. The punchlines worked, his comeuppance (“puny god”) was fun and he comes bearing a proper backstory and character arc that stayed entertaining even in the joke-packed Thor: Ragnarok.

summary: Coffee (Steve Rogers drabble)
title: Coffee (Steve Rogers drabble)
body:
Request: “How long would it take for Steve to ask someone he was interested in out for coffee?” (requested by @captainrogerrsbeard)

Warnings: none

Honestly, I think it might take Steve a good couple of weeks to work up the courage to ask someone out for coffee. He hasn’t had many dates, even before he went into the ice, but Steve just wants to make sure that he doesn’t mess anything up. Steve is still a gentleman. 

A/N: Two updates in one night? I have insomnia and sometimes it comes in handy! Keep requesting imagines, drabbles, anything.

blog.name: stephen-with-a-phd
blog.title: Protecting Your Reality
blog.description: I am the Sorcerer Supreme, and I like to annoy the shit out of one (1) Stark

summary: So apparently there’s this post about her not wanting a solo wasp film, and that’s cool I still respect her. But the comments...
body:
Evangeline Lily

So apparently there’s this post about her not wanting a solo wasp film, and that’s cool I still respect her. But the comments are just like…idk but what the fuck is this? This isn’t what the fandom stands for??? It’s just complete shit. They’re agreeing with her for all the wrong reasons, I mean look at this:

I stan the wasp, and none of the female hero’s deserve those disgraceful comments. I mean these actresses take these parts to the heart because they want their characters to stand out and receive the recognition they know the women deserve. Does this piss anyone else off? I don’t even care if I’m overreacting it’s 2018 why the fuck are these people still out here dragging them like they do those actresses jobs, like they bring the character to life and spend countless trying to figure out how to do them justice. Anyways

summary: Dancing w/ Steve • Headcanon #1
title: Dancing w/ Steve • Headcanon #1
body:
Request: “Fluffy Steve ask!! He wants to dance with you… is he playing music from his time or current stuff?” (requested by @captainrogerrsbeard)

Warnings: none, just fluff

► Although he is somewhat caught up on current music, Steve is still a sucker for 30′s/40′s music

► Dancing to old music reminds him of when times were just a bit easier for him

► Then again, Steve does like some of the slow songs from current albums: Lay Me Down (Sam Smith), Sign of the Times (Harry Styles), Sweater Weather (The Neighbourhood), just anything that gives him a reason to dance with his best girl/boy

► On a couple different occasions, you and Steve had been found in the kitchen in the early hours of the morning, dancing while music was playing off your phone

► Sometimes you’ll dance with your feet on his

► Other times, he’ll pick you up and dance with your legs wrapped around his waist 

► The other Avengers (mostly Tony) will have FRIDAY record it and try to use it as blackmail but it never really works

► As you two dance, Steve is just…blown away that he’s still here, holding you in his arms 

A/N: Hey guys! If you would like to request any imagines, inbox me. It can be smut, clean, have poly-relationships, anything. Love y’all!!!
